duties_responsibilities.duty: Responsible for Federal domestic tax due diligence work for clients
Review Federal and State income and payroll tax returns
Review financial statements, and books and records.
Lead client relationships on day to day tax matters supporting partners with service execution.
Research and consult on technical matters related to tax due diligence.
Proactively build relationships and communicate effectively with the client to provide superior client service.
Manage, train and develop staff. Participate in the performance review process.
